attributes.action: Referendum on Major Decisions Post "YES"  Scottish Independence
attributes.additional_details:
In the event of a  "YES" vote on Scottish Independence any major decisions, monetary union, use of the pond, trident or military contracts north of the border and the like should be put to the British People.
   This could be done at the same time as the 2015 general election there by costing as little as possible.
   We the people most be consulted on the decisions the will radically alter the nature of Britain!
